item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. FCC opens entire 6 GHz band to low power device operations (521 points | 182 comments)
2. Mysterious New Jersey drone sightings prompt call for 'state of emergency' (252 points | 394 comments)
3. Ham Radio All-in-One-Cable (77 points | 11 comments)
4. Chatbot hinted a kid should kill his parents over screen time limits: lawsuit (224 points | 301 comments)
5. The Cold Email Handbook (131 points | 61 comments)
6. QEMU with VirtIO GPU Vulkan Support (152 points | 29 comments)
7. Review of Mullvad VPN (278 points | 86 comments)
8. Deciphering C++ compiler errors: Nonsensical errors from a function declaration (7 points | 1 comment)
9. PeerTube mobile app: discover videos while caring for your attention (339 points | 127 comments)
10. OnlyFans models are using AI impersonators to keep up with their DMs (179 points | 209 comments)
11. Tricking c64 basic into clearing a hi-res screen quickly (14 points | 1 comment)
12. Instant macOS install on Proxmox including AMD patches (116 points | 37 comments)
13. Launch HN: Azalea Robotics (YC S24) – Baggage-handling robots for airports (93 points | 58 comments)
14. Pgroll – Zero-downtime, reversible, schema changes for PostgreSQL (new website) (186 points | 33 comments)
15. 2400 phone providers may be shut down by the FCC for failing to stop robocalls (285 points | 162 comments)
16. A letter to open-source maintainers (100 points | 17 comments)
17. The GPU is not always faster (125 points | 68 comments)
18. RISC-V HiFive Premier P550 Development Boards with Ubuntu Now Available (136 points | 71 comments)
19. Evolving my ergonomic setup (or, my laptop with extra steps) (122 points | 55 comments)
20. The Myth of Bananaland (119 points | 85 comments)
21. Dioxus 0.6 – Crossplatform apps with Rust (209 points | 85 comments)
22. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (668 points | 349 comments)
23. Dear OAuth Providers (189 points | 41 comments)
24. Django and Postgres for the Busy Rails Developer (140 points | 75 comments)
25. Trillium TPU Is GA (140 points | 55 comments)
26. Charge Robotics (YC S21) is hiring MechEs to build robots that build solar farms ( | hide)
27. Unix Review Magazine Interviews Larry Tesler (36 points | 5 comments)
28. AI Guesses Your Accent (170 points | 201 comments)
29. Storing Times for Human Events (88 points | 36 comments)
30. Borax or Baking Soda Rectifier and the glow (2003) (58 points | 7 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
